html:
4.11.25  9:56 am   i hate the letter x it's so useless it can always be replaced "xylophone" to "zylophone", "alex" to "aleks" it's so useless

      ever tried to mark a spot

4.11.25  9:30 am   Damn, you seem like you'd be vry cool if you were real. It's a shame you aren't :(

      what about you, how real do you suppose you are

4.11.25  9:23 am   how green is green's theorem

      not at all

4.11.25  8:26 am   which planet in the solar system is your favorite?

      i've only been to this one

4.11.25  5:35 am   who are the people most likely to fall for ragebait

      nice try

4.11.25  3:06 am   i feel like my technical skill (on keys) is getting in the way of my songwriting & improv. especially as i move from pop/rock/blues jams to jazz. i think i have good feel and good musical understanding, but my hand independence is really bad. usually if i'm playing a right hand line i can only manage a single note bassline or a simple chord sequence (with simple rhythm) in the left. so when i want to try a certain musical idea, sometimes i find i just can't play it, so sometimes i lose the idea before i can capture it. and when i solo i either get really sloppy or dull trying to play 2 hands at once or i play just a melody with often no one comping. i feel like the solution is supposed to be "practice solos you like" or something but i feel so far away from being able to play them...not to mention transcribing takes forever. especially solos with octave lines (which is a lot) are hard cause that's at the edge of my reach. what do i work on to be able to play what i am thinking?

      this answer is so simple you probably won't believe me. you get better the more you play. that's it. and by play i don't mean the not fun kind

4.11.25  1:34 am   at what point do you decide whether something is finished? feels like an arbitrary decision

      in that case i guess i don't know

4.10.25  11:49 pm   Have you performed any rituals?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.10.25  11:04 pm   Is the shot of you in the "I just did a bad thing" video playing the guitar while wearing big glasses your Buddy Holly impression?

      no, that's my impression of a person wearing glasses while playing guitar. if anyone else has ever worn glasses while playing guitar this is purely coincidental

4.10.25  10:57 pm   What do you do when you can't sleep?

      everything. first make a list of everything, to make sure you got everything

4.10.25  10:18 pm   how do i stop feeling sad?

      that's easy, just stop stopping to stop not being happy

4.10.25  9:34 pm   did you know about roundhay garden scene before you were working on the day goes on or did you find it while working on it

      i knew about it before. i'm going to take a guess and say the reason i found it is because of questions here about "what is your favorite movie" and i was compelled to say it would be the oldest one in existence. then some surface level research led me to that clip

4.10.25  9:08 pm   Have you ever walked into a room and [      ] and then walked out of a room

      not exactly

4.10.25  8:56 pm   you seem like a calm and reasonable person...... are you a calm and reasonable person?

      from time to time

4.10.25  7:58 pm   in videos like "perfect" and "out to lunch" are so good, I wanna know how to animate like that and  make backgrounds and stuff like that. it looks so cartoony, and super cool. Also "2 Friends on the Beach" is a really good one, it looks very explorable. any tips or things I should know about how you make those videos?

      no. you don't wanna do it the way i do it. it's not worth it

4.10.25  7:30 pm   Why can't the sky project more colors then sky blue?

      because you're never looking when it does

4.10.25  7:14 pm   what do you do when you're sick?

      might be the perfect time to begin learning a foreign language. you can have a race, see if you can learn the entire language during that time

4.10.25  6:08 pm   Thank you for your wonderful songs

      don't worry i'm doing more, just in case you might feel that way

4.10.25  5:56 pm   A cello player asked my friend if he played any instruments and my friend said he played guitar. The guy that played cello said "oh, that doesn't count.". 

      to be fair he might have been living on another planet

4.10.25  4:54 pm   How do you go about doing something you are nervous about?

      just try it. the only way to get not nervous is to do it like 100 times anyway, so you might as well get started

4.10.25  4:54 pm   Life Update: I Am In A Kitchen

      i find this a whopping 74% believable

4.10.25  4:20 pm   Whats your opinion on the Loch Ness Monster conspiracy?

      brilliant marketing, you gotta admit

4.10.25  3:43 pm   what do you do when there are too many words to choose from?

      put it to music. a musical word is worth at least 100 regular words

4.10.25  3:15 pm   if time was a flavor, would it taste like a looping gif of a melting clock

      no

4.10.25  3:11 pm   do you like computers

      can't live with them, can't live without them

4.10.25  2:59 pm   mmmmmmm, birb 🕊️

      oh i always thought that was a dird

4.10.25  2:52 pm   is it fun to name a playist "unplaylistable" with song i would listen to once in a while

      sure

4.10.25  2:33 pm   Do you keep a journal to externalize your thoughts? Or is that what your music is for?

      music is specifically for the feelings that cannot otherwise be expressed with words alone. in addition i do a lot of journaling, and i used to recommend it to everyone until i realized other people might not necessarily be the exact same as me

4.10.25  2:01 pm   I need to get a good, natural "kerplunk" sound to record for this thing I'm working on. Any suggestions? 

      this is so easy. just walk around the house and gather up a few small objects. doesn't really matter what. then start recording and put the headphones on. what you'll discover is you actually didn't even need to collect any objects. you can make just about any sound you'll ever need just using your hands and mouth in different ways, close to the mic. there's really no point in me describing what to do, as soon as you get behind the mic you'll be in paradise and you'll discover more than i could ever predict. just make sure you have the headphones on so you can hear what you're getting

4.10.25  1:48 pm   the past tense of "flit" is "flitted" which is really lame. if you could change it to something else what would you pick?

      i'm not even familiar with that word, but let's say "flet"

4.10.25  1:44 pm   have you ever tried your hand at baking bread?

      no, but i know someone who has

4.10.25  1:17 pm   DO YOU EVER sorry caps were on. do you ever ride the bus 

      could happen

4.10.25  1:09 pm   What do you think about the word defenestration

      more of a conversation piece than an actual word. it's very popular to bring it up at parties, like "hey do you know about this word, with this funny meaning". that is probably the primary usage for this word

4.10.25  1:00 pm   how old is the word "old"?

      at least 1000 years, but if you're willing to let it start to gradually sound different and gradually morph into a slightly different meaning, then you can always go back further

4.10.25  12:39 pm   About to give the most important exam of my life (seriously my life depends on it ) any tips?

      treat the exam like an old friend

4.10.25  12:16 pm   Imagine a giant arrow that pointed to nothing. That would be pretty funny don't you think

      yes, i have used that technique before

4.10.25  11:53 am   Do you have any tips for amateur composers?

      the pressure's off. go wild

4.10.25  11:39 am   Did you know that the word 'thing' used to mean 'court case' before it came to mean things in general?

      i did not know that. but it sounds plausible

4.10.25  9:45 am   wait... this sounds crazy... but do you happen to like music?

      it's hard to describe the feelings

4.10.25  8:37 am   Which planet of the solar system do you think most resembles the Roman god it was named after?

      terra

4.10.25  7:34 am   In music class I find myself getting creatively stifled by my teachers, and have progressively started feeling more caged in my song writing. Do you recommend I keep trying to defer from them or let their influence impact even more?

      i mean, .... music is total voodoo. it's gonna have to come from you. no need to take class too seriously. it's just an opportunity for you to hear from somebody else who's wrestled with the mysteries in perhaps a different way than you would

4.10.25  7:34 am   Did your phone ever help you get out of the barren wasteland? Also can I have some updates on the rabbit

      i will tell new stories instead. some of them will be longer than that one, so if you watch part of it then pause for a little while, and press play again, that should deliver the update experience you crave

4.10.25  7:07 am   Why are video games so popular but audio games are not?

      the dirty secret is, video games have audio in them. they are audio-video games. so usually you're gonna want both. but we mustn't forget there are some fun audio games. like guess what language the person is speaking, or guess when this song recording is released. or guess whether this sound is a bird or plane

4.10.25  6:07 am   Is math racist?

      i never thought of it that way. let me think. no it's not

4.10.25  5:16 am   What is a topic you would recommend learning about?

      i can no easier give a cold recommendation than guess your middle name

4.10.25  3:55 am   Would you accept a sponsorship from a company that sprinkles dirt on top of streetlights?

      for purposes of vertical integration, i'll put dirt on the streetlights myself

4.10.25  1:44 am   thoughts on poetry as an art form?

      you might think it's extinct, until you realize it's everywhere

4.10.25  1:00 am   do you prefer naps or sleeping for a really long time

      at the risk of shattering your worldview........ sometimes i take really long naps

4.9.25  11:56 pm   Do you have any paper clips I could borrow?

      sure, you can borrow all my paperclips. loan them out to others, get a pyramid scheme goin

4.9.25  11:49 pm   Pick a number between 10 and 50 where the number is odd in both digits but they cannot be the same. You can pick 19, 17, or 15 but you can't pick 11.

      i apologize for not choosing 37 like i am supposed to
